Literature.Title: Origin and functional diversification of an amphibian defense peptide arsenal.
Literature.Author: Roelants K, Fry BG, Ye L, Stijlemans B, Brys L, Kok P, Clynen E, Schoofs L, Cornelis P, Bossuyt F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Mouse splenocytes:IC50=16 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=1µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=32µM),Trypanosoma brucei(90-100% Killing=2-64µM)
